item.description: systemd Purpose Responsible for initializing and managing daemons and services Interacting with systemd Users interact with systemd by using the systemctl package and defining unit files systemctl provides the end user access to information and control overall services, daemons, and unit files Unit Files Unit files are used to complete a default or custom service Each systems unit files are stored in the /lib/systemd/system directory If you ever wish to modify the way any given unit functions you would edit the unit file inside of /etc/systemd/system
